title: Another normal draft post
body: I know it's been brought up often, and I understand that it can't be implemented on its own because of the small playerbase on our server. But I was thinking, what if it was like the ranked solo/duo and flex queues? I obviously don't have Riot's data and I'm not sure if this is feasible, but I think it would be good if normal draft could rotate with normal blind pick. That way we'd have the best of both worlds without splitting the queue.
